mecard.customer

Class FlatUserFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.customer.FlatUserFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerFormatter

    public class FlatUserFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerFormatter
    Formats a customer object to and from flat user format and MeCard Customer types.
    Since:
    1.0
